meanings.definition: The act of removing or destroying pests or vermin.
meanings.sent1: The disinfestation of the house was necessary to get rid of the pesky ants.
meanings.sent2: We hired professionals for the disinfestation of our garden to eliminate the termite infestation.
meanings.sent3: The mice threw a party in the pantry, so we had to organize a disinfestation to kick them out.
meanings.sent4: After the disinfestation, the garden bloomed with new life, free from the harmful insects.
meanings.sent5: The disinfestation turned the infested area into a safe haven, free from any unwanted guests.

meanings.definition: The process of eliminating infestations of insects or other unwanted organisms.
meanings.sent1: Proper disinfestation is crucial to maintain a healthy environment in agricultural fields.
meanings.sent2: The disinfestation of the warehouse was successful in getting rid of the moth infestation.
meanings.sent3: The disinfestation team arrived with their gear, ready to battle the invading insects.
meanings.sent4: The disinfestation process was like a silent army eradicating the unwanted pests.
meanings.sent5: Thanks to the disinfestation efforts, the crops flourished without any interference from pests.
